== Bijavara (610825) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Bijavara is a village in the [[Madhugiri ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 297.34 hectares and harbouring 429 households with total population of 1610 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Madhugiri]] is at a distance of 3 km. Male population is 813 and female population is 797. Scheduled Caste Population is 672 and Scheduled Tribes population is 143. Census Location Code of the village is 610825<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
